about_the_game:
This demo will be the initial part of the game, showing a little about the supposed beginnings of zombies' existence!
Only later, due to the lack of a cure, it was necessary to train professionals to carry out the "cleaning" of the infested places.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not suitable for all ages: Violence and detailed violence.
